H0.text: What company makes Big Red and Juicy Fruit gum. Mondelez International

H1.text: What company makes Big Red and Juicy Fruit gum. Perfetti Van Melle

H2.text: What company makes Big Red and Juicy Fruit gum. Hershey's

H3.text: What company makes Big Red and Juicy Fruit gum. Wrigley

A4.text: Big Red is a cinnamon flavored chewing gum introduced by the William Wrigley Jr. Company in 1975.

A5.text: Like its sister product, Juicy Fruit, Big Red had its own commercial jingle, called Kiss a Little Longer, which was used from 1979 to 1998.
